text: John J. Lloyd (1922 - October 4, 2014) was an American art director and production designer. He was known for his work on such movies as National Lampoon's Animal House, The Blues Brothers, The Thing, Big Trouble in Little China, and The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. Lloyd died in Santa Monica, California, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Detroit
title: John J. Lloyd
